CARBON CREDIT STANDARDS

Air4planet works with known standard for the voluntary carbon credits.

CARBON CREDIT PARNERS

WHAT IS A CARBON CREDIT?

A carbon credit is a certificate that permits a company to emit one tonne of carbon dioxide or other greenhouse gases (GHG).

There is a quota within the schemes so businesses cannot emit unlimited GHGs into the atmosphere. Carbon credits are then used towards offsetting projects to remove carbon dioxide from the residual emissions organizations have left over in conjunction with reductions.

Video presentated by EDAME
